00039 #include <QPoint>

00041 #include "DifferentialGeometry.h"

00051 RayTracerNoTr::RayTracerNoTr( InstanceNode* rootNode,
00052                InstanceNode* lightNode,
00053                TLightShape* lightShape,
00054                TSunShape* const lightSunShape,
00055                Transform lightToWorld,
00056                //TTransmissivity* transmissivity,
00057                RandomDeviate& rand,
00058                QMutex* mutex,
00059                TPhotonMap* photonMap )
00060 :m_rootNode( rootNode ),
00061 m_lightNode( lightNode ),
00062 m_lightShape( lightShape ),
00063 m_lightSunShape( lightSunShape ),
00064 m_lightToWorld( lightToWorld ),
00065 m_pRand( &rand ),
00066 m_mutex( mutex ),
00067 m_photonMap( photonMap )
00068 //m_transmissivity( transmissivity )
00069 {
00070 }
00071 
00072 //generating the ray
00073 bool RayTracerNoTr::NewPrimitiveRay( Ray* ray, ParallelRandomDeviate& rand, int a, int b )
00074 {
00075         //generating the photon
00076         Point3D origin = m_lightShape->Sample( rand.RandomDouble(), rand.RandomDouble(), a, b );
00077         //generating the ray direction
00078         Vector3D direction;
00079         m_lightSunShape->GenerateRayDirection( direction, rand );
00080         //generatin the ray
00081         *ray =  m_lightToWorld( Ray( origin, direction ) );
00082 
00083         return true;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 QPair< TPhotonMap*, std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > > RayTracerNoTr::operator()(  QPair< double, QPoint > pixel )
00088 {
00089         std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > photonsVector;
00090         ParallelRandomDeviate rand( m_pRand, m_mutex );
00091 
00092         double numberOfRays = pixel.first;
00093         QPoint coord = pixel.second;
00094 
00095         int coordA = coord.x();
00096         int coordB = coord.y();
00097 
00098     for(  unsigned long  i = 0; i < numberOfRays; ++i )
00099     {
00100         std::vector<Ray> currentRaysWay;
00101         Ray ray;
00102         if( NewPrimitiveRay( &ray, rand, coordA, coordB ) )
00103         {
00104                 photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( ray.origin, 1, 0, m_lightNode ) );
00105                 int rayLength = 0;
00106 
00107                         InstanceNode* intersectedSurface = 0;
00108                         bool isFront = false;
00109                         //bool isDirectSun = true;
00110 
00111                         //Trace the ray
00112                         bool isReflectedRay = true;
00113                         while( isReflectedRay )
00114                         {
00115                                 intersectedSurface = 0;
00116                                 isFront = 0;
00117                                 Ray reflectedRay;
00118                                 isReflectedRay = m_rootNode->Intersect( ray, rand, &isFront, &intersectedSurface, &reflectedRay );
00119 
00120                                 if( rayLength > 0 )
00121                                 {
00122                                         currentRaysWay.push_back( ray );
00123 
00124                                         /*if( m_transmissivity && !m_transmissivity->IsTransmitted( ray.maxt, rand ) )
00125                                         {
00126                                                 isReflectedRay = false;
00127                                                 ray.maxt = HUGE_VAL;
00128                                         }*/
00129 
00130                                 }
00131                                 if( isReflectedRay )
00132                                 {
00133                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), isFront, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00134 
00135                                         //Prepare node and ray for next iteration
00136                                         ray = reflectedRay;
00137                                         //isDirectSun = false;
00138                                 }
00139 
00140                         }
00141 
00142                         if( !(rayLength == 0 && ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL) )
00143                         {
00144                                 if( ray.maxt == HUGE_VAL  )
00145                                 {
00146                                         ray.maxt = 0.1;
00147                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), 0, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00148                                 }
00149                                 else
00150                                         photonsVector.push_back( RayTracerPhoton( (ray)( ray.maxt ), isFront, ++rayLength, intersectedSurface) );
00151                         }
00152 
00153                         if( currentRaysWay.size() > 0 )
00154                         {
00155                                 currentRaysWay.resize( currentRaysWay.size() );
00156                                 m_rootNode->Analyze(&currentRaysWay,m_mutex);
00157                                 currentRaysWay.clear();
00158                         }
00159 
00160                 }
00161 
00162     }
00163     photonsVector.resize( photonsVector.size() );
00164 
00165     return QPair< TPhotonMap*, std::vector< RayTracerPhoton > >( m_photonMap, photonsVector );
00166 
00167 }
